Uses of Class
com.fuse.ui.Node

  • Packages that use Node 
    Package Description
    com.fuse.ui  
    com.fuse.ui.extensions  

    • Uses of Node in com.fuse.ui

      Subclasses of Node in com.fuse.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventNode
      Custom Node type that extends the Node class with two events; drawEvent and updateEvent, which are triggered in respectively the draw() and update(float dt) methods.
      class  ImageNode 
      class  LambdaNode
      Custom Node type that extends the Node class with a setDrawFunc and setUpdateFunc which allows the user to use this node for any kind of custom behaviour.
      class  LineNode 
      class  RectNode 
      class  TextNode 
      Fields in com.fuse.ui declared as Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Node TouchEvent.mostRecentNode
      Latest node that was touched
      Node TouchEvent.node
      First node that was touched (and which this touch is basically "assigned to")
      Fields in com.fuse.ui with type parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Comparator<Node> Node.bottomPlaneFirst
      Comparator for ordering a list of Nodes from lower plane to higher plane (used for rendering)
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> EventNode.drawEvent 
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> Node.newChildEvent
      Triggered when a -direct- child is added to this node
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> Node.newOffspringEvent
      Triggered when a child is added to this node, or any of its offspring
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> Node.newParentEvent 
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> Node.positionChangeEvent 
      com.fuse.utils.Event<Node> Node.sizeChangeEvent 
      static Comparator<Node> Node.topPlaneFirst
      Comparator for ordering a list of Nodes from higher plane to lower plane (used by TouchManager)
